attributes.action: Force local councils to collect rubbish and recycling weekly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most local councils only collect rubbish and recycling on a fortnightly basis. I believe this is unexceptable. 

Most people are forced to throw recycling in the rubbish bin when their recycling containers reach maximum. 

Collecting fortnightly allows infestation of rats and other rodents.
